attributes.action: not put motorcyclists lives in even more danger by limiting their speed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not agree to the government capping the speed on motorcycles as this will only put more road users at risk. It takes away people's civil liberties. Whilst speeding is not condoned capping bikes speed will result in more deaths and serious injury

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
